I_Settings.performance_remind: Enable hardware acceleration for the best experience

I_StartModal.line1: This is an application that still in development. Please note that some bugs or errors may occur. If you encounter any issues, please report them on Github.
I_StartModal.line2: This application is not affiliated with any government or organization. All data are collected from open source and public data. If you are the owner of the data and want to remove it, please contact me at [INSERT EMAIL HERE].
I_StartModal.line3: Contribution are welcome! If you want to contribute, please check out the GitHub repository [INSERT LINK HERE].
